original_text: And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David into the hold to the wilderness men of might, and men of war fit for the battle, that could handle shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions, and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains;
korean_text: 갓 사람 중에서 광야에 있는 요새에 이르러 다윗에게 돌아온 자가 있었으니 다 용사요 싸움에 익숙하여 방패와 창을 능히 쓰는 자라 그의 얼굴은 사자 같고 빠르기는 산의 사슴 같으니

sentences.original_text: into the hold to the wilderness
and men of war fit for the battle
that could handle shield and buckler
whose faces were like the faces of lions
and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains
